pr_title: FM2-289: Add Integration Tests for Observation

timeline.message:
FM2-289: Add Integration Tests for Observation

This also:

- Validates objects before saving them to the database
- Adds units to observations where they exist
- Removes the ability to "update" Observations (pending further analysis)
- Fixes various test data examples to work with proper validations
